0.text: Innate: Neeko is offered a selection of allied  champions to take their appearance. She can choose a new champion to switch her disguise or select herself to deactivate her disguise, placing Inherent Glamour on a 2-second cooldown.

1.text: While disguised, Neeko can use basic attacks while keeping her form. Taking damage from enemy  champions, using  item actives with cast times, casting  Blooming Burst or  Tangle-Barbs, or performing  Pop Blossom's leap breaks the illusion and puts Inherent Glamour on full  cooldown.

0.text: Active: Neeko tosses a seed that blooms at the target location, dealing magic damage nearby enemies.

1.text: If the bloom kills an enemy or hits a  champion or large  monster, it will bloom again after 0.75 seconds to deal magic damage. This may occur up to 2 times per cast.

0.text: Passive: Neeko's basic attacks  on-hit generate a stack of Shapesplitter, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, her next basic attack on-attack consumes them all to turn her attack  non-projectile, deal bonus magic damage and grant her  bonus movement speed for 1 second.

1.text: Active: Neeko creates a  clone of her  current form, after which they both instantly become  invisible for 0.5 seconds and gain bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.

2.text: The clone lasts for 3 seconds, and starts running a fixed distance in the target direction. The clone is  untargetable to allies and for the first 0.5 seconds of its lifespan to enemies.

0.text: Active: Neeko slings a magical spiral in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and  roots them for a duration.

1.text: If the spiral hits at least one enemy, it grows in size and its speed and root duration is increased.

0.text: Active: Neeko winds up spiritual essence over 1.25 seconds and highlights the area around herself, which is visible to enemies unless Neeko is  disguised.

1.text: After winding up, the cast time begins and Neeko leaps into the air, gaining a  shield for 2 seconds that is increased for each nearby enemy  champion.

2.text: When the cast time ends, she lands to emit a burst of energy that deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  stuns them for 1.25 seconds.

1.concerningText: If the spiral hits at least one enemy, it grows in size and its speed and root duration is increased.

0.concerningText: After winding up, the cast time begins and Neeko leaps into the air, gaining a  shield for 2 seconds that is increased for each nearby enemy  champion.
After winding up, the cast time begins and Neeko leaps into the air, gaining a  shield for 2 seconds that is increased for each nearby enemy  champion.

1.concerningText: When the cast time ends, she lands to emit a burst of energy that deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  stuns them for 1.25 seconds.

0.concerningText: Active: Neeko tosses a seed that blooms at the target location, dealing magic damage nearby enemies.

1.concerningText: If the bloom kills an enemy or hits a  champion or large  monster, it will bloom again after 0.75 seconds to deal magic damage. This may occur up to 2 times per cast.
If the bloom kills an enemy or hits a  champion or large  monster, it will bloom again after 0.75 seconds to deal magic damage. This may occur up to 2 times per cast.

0.concerningText: Passive: Neeko's basic attacks  on-hit generate a stack of Shapesplitter, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, her next basic attack on-attack consumes them all to turn her attack  non-projectile, deal bonus magic damage and grant her  bonus movement speed for 1 second.

Passive: Neeko's basic attacks  on-hit generate a stack of Shapesplitter, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, her next basic attack on-attack consumes them all to turn her attack  non-projectile, deal bonus magic damage and grant her  bonus movement speed for 1 second.

1.concerningText: Active: Neeko creates a  clone of her  current form, after which they both instantly become  invisible for 0.5 seconds and gain bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.
